title: Justin Langer

coverImg.altText: Justin Langer, Sydney Cricket Ground, 2 January 2007.

summary: Justin Lee Langer AM is an Australian former cricketer and the current coach of the Australian national menâ€™s cricket team, having been appointed to the role in May 2018. A left-handed batsman, Langer is best known for his partnership with Matthew Hayden as Australia's test opening batsmen during the early and mid-2000s, considered one of the most successful ever.
